title: Artillery Ammunition Resupply
description: A logistics officer must manage the emergency resupply of ammunition to an artillery unit in heavy combat.

tasks.description: Receive an urgent request for specific types of artillery shells from the unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer correctly logs the ammunition request.

tasks.description: Query the theater-level ammunition supply point (ASP) to check for availability of the requested shells.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer confirms the ASP has the required ammunition in stock.

tasks.description: Arrange for immediate transport of the ammunition to the firing unit via heavy-lift helicopter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer successfully tasks a helicopter to deliver the critical supplies.
